# Mentalism (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Deep Duerra |

**Granted Powers (Sp):** Once per day as a standard action, you can generate a mental ward, granting a creature you touch a resistance bonus on its next Will saving throw equal to your level +2. The mental ward is an abjuration effect with a duration of 1 hour.

**Mentalism Domain Spells**

**1 [[Confusion, Lesser (Spell)|Confusion, Lesser]]:** One creature acts randomly for 1 round.

**2 [[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**3 [[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|Clairaudience/Clairvoyance]]:** See or hear at a distance for 1 minute/level.

**4 [[Modify Memory (Spell)|Modify Memory]]:** Changes 5 minutes of subject’s memories.

**5 [[Mind Fog (Spell)|Mind Fog]]:** Subjects in fog get –10 to Wisdom and Will checks.

**6 [[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|Telepathic Bond]]:** Link lets allies communicate.

**7 [[Antipathy (Spell)|Antipathy]]:** Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

**8 [[Mind Blank (Spell)|Mind Blank]]:** Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

**9 [[Astral Projection (Spell)|Astral Projection]] <sup>M</sup>:** Projects you and companions onto the [[Astral Plane]].


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 276 |
|---|---|
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 88 |
